ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
}
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"),
  total = JSON.parse(result).data.eps.total,
  limit = JSON.parse(result).data.eps.limit,
  chapters = [];
pages = parseInt(total / limit) + 1;
for (i = pages; i > 0; i--) {
  url = getUrl(baseUrl.match(/(comics\/.*\/eps\?page=)/)[1] + i, "get", "");
  list = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.eps.docs;
  for (j = 0; j < list.length; j++) {
    order = list[j].order;
    index = order - 1;
    link = getUrl(baseUrl.match(/(comics\/.*)\/eps\?page=/)[1] +"/order/" +`${order}` +"/pages?page=1","get","");
    chapters[index] = {
      title: index == total - 1 ? list[j].title+`〔${date}〕` : list[j].title,
      link: link
    };
  }
}
JSON.stringify(chapters);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list,
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  date = list[i].update_time.replace(/\s.*/, "");
  title = list[i].title
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 
      ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: list[i].imagelist,
    is_Vip: list[i].isvip == "1" ? "true" : "false",
    is_Pay: list[i].isvip == "1" ? "true" : "false",
        time: list[i].update_time
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);

eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
function explore(title, url, Grow, BasisPercent, wrapBefore) {
  style = `{
    title:"${title}",
    url:"${url}",
    style:{
      layout_flexGrow:${Grow},
      layout_flexBasisPercent:${BasisPercent},
      layout_wrapBefore: ${wrapBefore}
    }
  }`;
  return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];

week = ["周一", "周二", "周三", "周四", "周五", "周六", "周日"]
for (i in week) {
  url = `${host}/json/week.php?up=${parseInt(i)+1}&page={{page-1}}&line=10`
  java.log(url)
  exploreUrl.push(explore(week[i], url, 1, 0.2, false))
}

title = [
  "全部", "连载", "完结", "新作", "推荐", "热门", "收藏"];
s = "/json/comic.php?ticai="
k = "&up=0&page={{page-1}}&line=10&orderby="
url = [
  `${host}${s}&jindu=0${k}update_time`,
  `${host}${s}0&jindu=1${k}update_time`,
  `${host}${s}0&jindu=2${k}update_time`,
  `${host}${s}0&jindu=0${k}id`,
  `${host}${s}0&jindu=0${k}likes`,
  `${host}${s}0&jindu=0${k}click`,
  `${host}${s}0&jindu=0${k}fav`
]
for (j in title) {
  exploreUrl.push(explore(title[j], url[j], 1, 0.2, false))
}

kind = [
  "全部", "巨乳", "剧情", "浪漫", "戏剧", "正妹", "爱情",
  "都市", "同居", "多人", "", "诱惑", "大尺度", ""];
for (j in kind) {
  url = 
    kind[j] == "全部" 
      ? `${host}${s}&jindu=0${k}update_time`
      : kind[j] == ""
      ? ""
      : `${host}${s}${kind[j]}&jindu=0${k}update_time`
  java.log(url)
  exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false))
}

flag == 1
  ? java.log(`\n[${String(exploreUrl)}]`)
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = JSON.parse(result).length,
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  type = list[i].price == "2"
    ? "🔓"
    : list[i].price == "1"
    ? "🆓"
    : "⏳"
  title = list[i].name;
  title = String(title)
    .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
    .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
    .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
    .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
    .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
    .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? title.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1");
  data.push({
    num: list[i].num,
    title: i == list.length - 1
      ? `${type}${title}〔${list[i].stime.replace(/\//g, "-")}〕` : `${type}${title}`,
    link: list[i].gold  !== "VIP"
      ? `/json/info.php?id=${String(list[i].url).match(/\d+/)}&type=1`
      : `title=${list[i].name}&isVip=VIP&$time=${list[i].stime}&num=${list[i].num}`,
    isVip: list[i].gold  == "VIP" ? true : false,
    time: list[i].stime
  });
};
java.put("list", JSON.stringify(data));
</js>

  data.push({
    num: list[i].num,
    title: i == list.length - 1
      ? `${type}${title}〔${list[i].stime.replace(/\//g, "-")}〕` : `${type}${list[i].name}`,
    link: list[i].gold  !== "VIP"
      ? `/json/info.php?id=${String(list[i].url).match(/\d+/)}&type=1`
      : `title=${list[i].name}&isVip=VIP&$time=${list[i].stime}&num=${list[i].num}`,

  });
};

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".list-item"),
  data = [];
date = String(java.getElements(".book-header p.2").text()).replace(/更新时间./, "")
v = '{"webView":true}'
for (i in list) {
  str = list[i].select(".cell-type").attr("onclick");
  lid = str.match(/(\d+)/g)[1];
  bid = str.match(/(\d+)/g)[0];
  key = java.aesEncodeToBase64String(lid, "12cdefgabcdefg12", "AES/ECB/PKCS5Padding", "");
  title = list[i].select(".cell-title").text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: `${host}/play?linkId=${lid}&bookId=${bid}&path=${p}&key=${key},${v}`
  })
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var data = [];
list = java.getElements(".weui-cells a");
list == "" ? list =java.getElements("#chapterlist li a") : list;
t1 = String(java.getElements(".placeholder.f-red").text()).replace(/更新时间：|\s.*/g, "");
t2 = String(java.getElements(".update-time").text()).replace(/更新/, "");
t3 = String(java.getElements(".pt-info.3").text()).replace(/更新：|\s.*/g, "");
date = String(t1+t2+t3)
for (i in list) {
  pages = String(list[i].text()).match(/\s(\d+)\s/)[1];
  title = baseUrl.match("toptoonmh") || baseUrl.match("tuhaomh")
    ? list[i].select("a").text()
    : list[i].select(".weui-cell__bd p").text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, "")
      .replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1
      ? `${title} (${pages}P)〔${date}〕` : `${title} (${pages}P)`,
    link: "bid=" + baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.html/)[1] +
      "&cid=" + String(list[i].attr("href")).match(/(\d+)/)[1] +
      "&pages=" + pages,
    is_Vip: String(list[i]).match(/icon/) ? "true" : "false",
    is_Pay: String(list[i]).match(/icon/) ? "true" : "false"
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".weui-cells a"),
  data = [];
date = java.getElements(".placeholder.f-red").text();
date = String(date).replace(/更新时间：|\s.*/g, "");
for (i in list) {
  pages = String(list[i].select(".f-green").text()).match(/(\d+)/)[1];
  title = list[i].select("p").text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, "")
      .replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1
      ? `${title} (${pages}P)〔${date}〕` :  `${title} (${pages}P)`,
    link: list[i].select(".icon") == ""
      ? list[i].select("a").attr("href")
      : "bid=" + baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.html/)[1] + 
        "&cid=" + String(list[i].attr("href")).match(/(\d+)/)[1] +
        "&pages=" + String(list[i].select(".f-green").text()).match(/(\d+)/)[1],
    is_Vip: String(list[i]).match(/icon/) ? "true" : "false",
    is_Pay: String(list[i]).match(/icon/) ? "true" : "false"
  })
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".view-win-list li a"),
  data = [];
date = String(java.getElements(".tip .block.2").text()).replace(/更新时间：/g, "");
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, "")
      .replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: `${list[i].attr("href")},{"headers":{"Referer": "${host}"}}`
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("#oneCon1 li a"),
  data = [];
date = java.getElements(".mh-detail p.4 @span.1").text();
date = String(date).replace(/\s.*/g, "")
for (i in list) {
  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title)
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data)
</js>
$[*]

      .replace(/^[\/]/g, ""),
    kind: list[i].tags,
    word: "",

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = JSON.parse(result.match(/initIntroData\(\[(.*)\]\)/)[1]).data,
  data = [];
date = String(java.getElements(".date").text()).replace(/最近更新：|\s.*/g, "");
reg = `${book.name}：`
for (i in list) {
  title = list[i].chapter_name
  title = title.replace(reg, "")
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length -1
      ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: `${host}/view/${list[i].comic_id}/${list[i].id}`,
    time: list[i].update_time
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("#chapterlistload li a"),
  data = [];
date = String(java.getElements(".tip span.block.3").text()).replace(/更新时间：/g, "");
for (i in list) {
  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".list .item a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title)
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: title,
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

date = String(time).replace(/时间：|\s/g, "");
var list = java.getElements(".fed-tabs-boxs li a!0"),
  data = [];

  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")

      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
function explore(title, url, Grow, BasisPercent, wrapBefore) {
  style = `{
    title:"${title}",
    url:"${host}/?page.currentPage={{page}}&orderType=3&subjectName=${url}&filmName=",
    style:{
      layout_flexGrow:${Grow},
      layout_flexBasisPercent:${BasisPercent},
      layout_wrapBefore: ${wrapBefore}
    }
  }`;
  return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];

tags = [
  "剧情", "恋爱", "冒险", "动作", "校园", "恐怖", "古风", "Bl",
  "搞笑", "科幻", "其他", "爱情", "生活", "后宫", "热血", "真人"];
for (i in tags) {
  url = `${host}/booklist?page={{page}}&tag=${tags[i]}`
  exploreUrl.push(explore(tags[i], url, 1, 0.2, false))
}
`[${String(exploreUrl)}]`;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("a.fed-btns-info.fed-rims-info.fed-part-eone"),
  data = [];
J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
date = J.select('[property="og:article:update_time"]').attr("content");
date = String(date).replace(/\s/g, "")
for (i in list) {  
  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}〔${date}〕` : title,
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("#chapterlist a"),
  data = [],
  nurl = "";
n = java.getElements("select option");
for (j = 1; j < n.length; j++) {
  nurl += host + n[j].attr("value") + ",";
}
java.put("nurl", nurl)
for (i in list) {
  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: title,
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
function explore(title, url, Grow, BasisPercent, wrapBefore) {
  style = `{
    title:"${title}",
    url:"${url}",
    style:{
      layout_flexGrow:${Grow},
      layout_flexBasisPercent:${BasisPercent},
      layout_wrapBefore: ${wrapBefore}
    }
  }`;
  return style;
}
var Year = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy"),
  month = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("MM"),
  Today = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("dd"),
  page = "{{page}}",
  exploreUrl = [],
  tags =[
  "剧情", "恋爱", "耽美", "真人", "冒险", "动作", "校园","搞笑",
  "其他", "恐怖", "BL", "3D漫画", "出版日漫", "单本日漫"];

url = `${host}/update?page=${page}&date=${Year}-${month}-${Today}&day=0`
exploreUrl.push(explore("✣　　　　　 ✣ 今日更新 ✣ 　　　　　✣", url, 1, 1, false))
for (i = 1; i < 7; i++) {
  title = `${month}月${Today - i}日`
  date = Today - i
  url = `${host}/update?page=${page}&date=${Year}-${month}-${date}&day=${i}`
  exploreUrl.push(explore(title, url, 1, 0.25, false))
}

url = `${host}/18toptoon?page=${page}&tag=全部&end=-1`
exploreUrl.push(explore("✣　　　　　  ✣  分类  ✣  　　　　　✣", url, 1, 1, true));
for (j in tags) {
  url = `${host}/18toptoon?page=${page}&tag=${tags[j]}&end=-1`
  exploreUrl.push(explore(tags[j], url, 1,0.25))
}

url = `${host}/18toptoon?page=${page}&tag=全部&end=1`
exploreUrl.push(explore("✣　　　　　  ✣  完结  ✣  　　　　　✣", url, 1, 1, true));
for (k in tags) {
  url = `${host}/18toptoon?page=${page}&tag=${tags[k]}&end=1`
  exploreUrl.push(explore(tags[k], url, 1,0.25))
}
U = `[${String(exploreUrl)}]`
java.log(U)
</js>
